mapper.select: /* common.getCommonCodeList 공통코드 리스트 조회 */ SELECT A.GRP_CODE_ID ,A.GRP_CODE_NM ,A.USE_YN ,A.DEL_YN ,A.SORT_ORDER ,A.UPDATE_USER ,A.UPDATE_DATE ,B.CODE_ID ,B.CODE_NM ,B.CODE_DESC FROM TBL_EXP_GRPCODE A ,TBL_EXP_CODE B WHERE A.GRP_CODE_ID = B.GRP_CODE_ID AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER
